story: Just a curious human who turned ‘what if I code this?’ into a daily habit. Now I build web apps that usually work — and when they don’t, I fix them faster than you can say ‘bug report’.

timeline.event: Graduated in Engineering, turning curiosity into code.
Onboarded at Digikull as an Intern, mastering fundamentals through real-world builds.
Joined Optiphonex as a Jr. Web Developer, turning specs into performant UI.
Delivering scalable front‑end solutions at Techerudite, sprint after sprint.
